text:
:corgi-wave: Hey all, we released a new version of the boilerplate -- <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v3.14.1|Take a peek here!>
• Replaced HubL blog_listing with the new React version, BlogPosts
• Improved XSS Security updates
<@U01NZBMNY3D> will sites using the existing blog_listing module keep working? Can we preview the new blog listing anywhere?

Hi James! You are correct -- any sites that are currently using blog_listing (which is pretty much most of them still!) will continue to work -- we wont remove that functionality. However it is no longer available to be added to content via the page editor and will no longer receive updates.
Also worth noting that the new react module is nearly identical and for all practical purposes is a 1:1 clone of the old module. It has simply been ported over to the react world! woot woot!
